hymn.title: Glory, glory, glory, praise and adoration

layout.singingstanza: Glo -- ry, glo -- ry, glo -- ry, praise and a -- dor -- a -- tion! Hear the an -- thems swell -- ing out thro' all et -- ern -- i -- ty! Fa -- ther, Son, and Spir -- it— God in rev -- e -- la -- tion— Pros -- trate each soul be -- fore the De -- i -- ty!

lyrics.stanza: Glory, glory, glory, praise and adoration! Hear the anthems swelling out thro' all eternity! Father, Son, and Spirit—God in revelation— Prostrate each soul before the Deity!
God supreme, we worship now in holy splendour, Head of the vast scene of bliss, before Thy face we fall! Majesty and greatness, glory, praise and power To Thee belong, eternal Source of all!
